dialogues.text: Whoa...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina turns around and sees her Double smiling at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina flees to the door. Pauses. She peeks back and sees t it's actually Lily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Relieved, she grabs Lily and kisses her, revved-up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily responds with equal force. They claw at each other, passion exceeding coordination.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily pulls Nina's shirt off and throws her onto the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She straddles Nina, who looks up at her carnivorously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily takes her own top off, plunges down and kisses Nina.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina flips Lily over, becomes the dominant one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily scratches Nina's back, over some of the rash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's subtle movement underneath the skin. Little pin pricks push up the flesh, trailing behind her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Self-conscious, Nina grabs Lily's hand and holds her wris down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She bites her neck. Lily smiles, likes the violence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She digs her nails into Nina's hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then Lily gets back on top of Nina. The tattooed lilies o her back undulate and spread out. Morphing into dark wing

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She kisses down Nina's body. Further and further... 71.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily starts to go down on Nina.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nervous, Nina whimpers. Glances down and sees the DOUBLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She tries to pull away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LILY shushes her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina calms back down, seeing that it's her. She takes a breath and succumbs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bumps shoot up all over her skin as her breath quickens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She closes her eyes, allows the sensation to invade her b and CLIMAXES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She breathes her way back to earth. Slowly her eyes open. She rolls over towards Lily. But Lily is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instead her DOUBLE hovers over her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweet girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She SMASHES a pillow over Nina's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina lies alone in bed, the sheets and comforter in disar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sits up, clutches her head in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks around, but there's no sign of Lily or the Doub

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then her eyes drift to the alarm clock: 11:36. 72.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She snaps out of bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dishevelled, Nina races towards the front door. She sees Erica brooding at the kitchen table, watching her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't you wake me up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica just stares at her, devastated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm moving out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina whips out the front door and leaves her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina races. She hears muffled Black Swan music playing, rehearsal clearly in progress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My music.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She runs into the wings and sees the full company rehears on stage for the first time...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another girl dancing her part.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The girl spins and Nina sees her face. It's Lily!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Horrified, Nina runs onto

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and makes a beeline for Leroy, looking beyond apologetic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dancers and piano player stop at the interruption.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep going. Let's finish the Act.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The piano music resumes, and the dancers pick up where th left off. 73.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina meets Lily's eyes. She makes a sorry face, but then continues dancing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina is forced to watch from the sidelines as Lily and Da finish the Black Swan's Pas de Deux.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was good. Let's take 10, then we'll move on to Act 4.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to Nina and his smile fades.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get warmed up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thomas, I'm sor-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He ignores her, and walks off stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily tentatively approaches with the PRACTICE TUTU.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina snatches it, avoiding eye contact. She puts it on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wanted to go through the spacing. Asked me to step in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina starts stretching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I overslept.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oops... Least you had a good time, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina doesn't answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You put something in my drink. 74-76.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And took off this morning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This morning?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, you slept over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, no. Unless your name's Tom and you have a dick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina stops herself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We what, Nina?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily can read something on her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What, you have some kind of lezzy wet dream?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina glances at the dancers, nervous they've heard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're lying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god, you totally fantasized about me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was I good?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Other dancers look over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina resumes stretching. Lily just walks away. 74-76A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina dances the end of the ballet, the White Swan's suici

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Swan has stolen your love. There's only one way to end the pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina climbs the stairs of the set and arrives at the "cli stopping at the precipice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not at all fearful. Filled with acceptance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina looks down. It's a short drop to a stack of pads, bu HARD FLOOR surrounds it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look at the Prince, then down at Rothbart, and, yes, up at the audience...And jump!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hesitates, fearful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead. You'll be fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina takes a breath and leaps in a swan dive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She falls...and lands in the pads, unhurt. Slight applaus from the other dancers.

dialogues.speaker: LEROY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Everybody get a drink then it's notes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina lies in the pads, completely exhausted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina sits backstage, toweling herself off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pauses, noticing Leroy and Lily conversing near the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily nods and touches his arm. He smiles warmly, then not Nina watching. His serious demeanor returns and he pulls away. He says goodbye to Lily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily follows his gaze and smirks at Nina, rubbing it in, before exiting herself. 74-76B.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina kneels in front of the toilet, a finger down her thr She gags, but nothing comes up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her eyes tear up, and she tries again, but still just hea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frustrated, she wipes her mouth and flushes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina exits the bathroom and approaches her mother's bedro door. It's closed, but the light's on underneath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's about to knock, but hesitates. Through the door, sh can hear the sound of her mother watching an INFOMERCIAL TV. An unfamiliar, lonely noise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina stands there for a moment, just breathing. She strengthens her resolve and backs away from the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina collapses on her bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She opens the JEWELRY BOX sitting on her night stand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She watches the ballerina spin for a moment...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then suddenly SLAMS the lid shut and throws the box hard against the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She shoots out of bed and starts gathering all her childi possessions--stuffed animals, dolls, keepsakes, etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina shoves her belongings into the TRASH CHUTE, a pile o her next victims strewn at her feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She grabs a TEDDY BEAR IN A TUTU, and jams him in. 77-78A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina dances the Black Swan in front of the nearly complet scenery.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few TECHNICIANS complete last minute touch-ups.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leroy watches from his down-stage post, his focus split between her and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily, stretching with the other ballerinas. She stares at Nina with a dark expression.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fueled by the competition, Nina pushes herself. Her danci becomes more impassioned and aggressive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She finishes the section, breathing deeply, covered in sw The company enthusiastically claps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stares intently at Leroy, awaiting his response.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At last, I saw the Black Swan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina wears the BLACK SWAN COSTUME, facing a mirror. Anoth mirror behind her creates an infinite array of reflection

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The overworked COSTUMER checks each seam, pulling the cos taut, analyzing what needs to be taken in and let out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina looks uncomfortable, disliking the scrutiny of her b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hears a sharp RUSTLE. Like someone's scratching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks up at the mirror. Her reflection stares back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind the first reflection, another Nina has her arm beh her back, like she's scratching her shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina leans to get a better look...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit still, I'm almost done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina startles. The reflection has returned to normal, its hand back at its side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Costumer checks one more thing, makes one more note.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, all set. 77-78B.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The costumer leaves her to change.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Relieved, Nina quickly takes off the costume and starts t dress in her sweats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hears someone enter the costume shop.

dialogues.speaker: LILY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Hey...Thomas sent me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina pauses, recognizing her voice.

dialogues.speaker: COSTUMER, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Yeah, need to get you measured for your Swan Queen costumes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina steps out from behind the privacy curtain, and finds Lily waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's she doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He made me your alternate. (can't help it) Just in case...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina pushes past her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina chases after Leroy, in mid-conversation with the STA MANAGER and two STAGEHANDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thomas!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stops and faces her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's trying to replace me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to stage manager,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead. I'll catch up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They continue walking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on? 77-78C.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily. You made her my alternate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's always an alternate, you know that. Lily's the best choice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She wants my role.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every dancer in the world wants your role.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, she's different. She's after me. She's trying to replace me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please believe me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He studies her for a moment, not sure what to make of thi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, I know it's been a struggle. But you had a breakthrough this morning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina starts to speak, he holds up his hand to silence her

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tomorrow is yours. Give a great performance, and you won't have to worry about Lily, or anyone else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No more. Go home and rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut down, she watches him walk away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina practices the Black Swan, alone with the jaded piano player, working herself hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He suddenly stops playing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I gotta life, deary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He closes the music book and stands.

dialogues.speaker: PIANO PLAYER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don't work too hard. It's your big day tomorrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annoyed, she watches him leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 85B She faces herself in the mirror and takes a breath. 8

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She resumes dancing without music, her feet CLICKING on t floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she moves, she notices something strange out of the co of her eye:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The reflection's dancing lags a little behind hers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina stops. The sound of her footsteps stops a second lat She stares at the mirror...troubled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door to the room BANGS shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She whips towards it and she's suddenly plunged into DARKNESS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freaked, she stumbles towards the door, and pushes out in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where it's equally dark. Lit only by the stage's "ghost light," a single bulb on a stand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Hey! I'm still in here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks at the cavernous auditorium. All those empty seats, faced towards her. Very overwhelming...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hears a noise in the wings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Turn the lights back on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gets to the other side of the stage, but the wings se empty. Quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 86B Then she hears the faint sound of MUFFLED BANGING. 86

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She heads towards the noise. The banging now accompanied GIGGLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's pretty dark but the sound is unmistakable: two peopl going at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina tiptoes past some off-stage SETS and LIGHTING EQUIPM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And peeks around a piece of SCENERY...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Catching a glimpse of Leroy fucking Lily further backstag She's wild, clearly enjoying it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina looks away, disgusted. She peeks back one more time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leroy has become the demon Rothbart, ravishing the Double She meets Nina's eyes and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina jumps back, knocking into a piece of the set. The lovemaking pauses at the sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina flees. 81.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina runs in and quickly jams her belongings into her bag

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She notices her reflection in the mirror and removes her diamond earrings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then gathers the other trinkets sitting on the counter an puts them all inside her bag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina pushes out the stage door, and passes the ROW OF POSTERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They now advertise Swan Lake and feature a beautiful photograph of Nina.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina stops and looks at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina slowly enters Beth's room, but remains at the thresh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beth sits in a wheelchair faced towards the window. Sleep

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina gets up the nerve and quietly walks further in, tryi not to wake her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina pulls out the tube of lipstick from her bag and gent places it on the hospital table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pulls out the diamond earrings, sets them down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Followed by the makeup compact, the pack of cigarettes, a needle and thread, and an emory board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hand suddenly GRABS Nina's arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Awake, Beth stares Nina down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stunned, Nina's unable to answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beth follows her gaze to the random items on her table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beth begins touching the objects, vaguely remembering. 82.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't mean to make you feel this way. It's happening to me now. She's trying to replace me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beth sees the earrings and it all clicks in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You stole all these things?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just wanted to be like you. Perfect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beth shoots Nina a dark look and turns away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not perfect. I'm nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fucking nothing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beth grabs the emory board and stabs herself in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing! Nothing!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beth?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina spins Beth around. She is now a bloody version of TH DOUBLE! She continues stabbing herself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina grabs the Double's hand and struggles to restrain he

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop it! Stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The emory board stabs into Nina's arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina rushes from the room. 83.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She BANGS into a empty stretcher sitting in the hallway, causing a CLAMOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The older nurse looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina jumps into an open elevator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hits the GROUND FLOOR BUTTON, and hides in the corner

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the doors close, she looks down and sees that, in one hand, she holds the BLOODY EMORY BOARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She drops it, disgusted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina runs in and quickly shuts the door behind her. Takes breath, and notices some blood still on her hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She flips on the light. The room's empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She goes to the sink and washes her hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She finishes, and flips the light off as she walks out of room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pauses, rushes back and flips on the light. The Doubl stares at her from the corner, her face covered in blood. Terrified, Nina runs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She goes straight to the toilet and VOMITS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hears a creaking sound in the apartment and looks tow the open door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mommy?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She goes out to investigate. 83A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina flings open the door, but Erica's not in there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hears RUSTLING, then WHISPERING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina looks around the room. The paintings of herself seem move slightly. Blink. Mouths move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They whisper: "Sweet girl" and then start chanting "My tu my turn, my turn!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina cups her hands over her ears, trying to block it out

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hears a BANG and looks towards the door. No one's the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She glimpses the mirror, which reflects down the hallway. sees her Double rushing towards the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scared, Nina whips around, just as her mother arrives in doorway. 84.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina pushes past her, in a frenzy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina closes the door. Sticks in the broken piece of wood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pain shoots through her shoulder. She SCREAMS, instinctively reaching for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She quickly yanks off the sweater and looks at the vanity mirror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her back pulsates unnaturally. Tiny black tips poke throu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door opens and catches on the doorjamb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica starts POUNDING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She digs into the open bump on her shoulder with her fingernails.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open the door!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica violently pushes and pulls, jostling the piece of w

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina concentrates, takes hold of the growth and yanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blood vessels in her eyes explode, making the white turn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina looks at the object held in her fingers: a sharp, TI BLACK SPINE. Like that of a sea urchin. Damp, feathery wi hang off of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door flings open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica rushes in and finds Nina half-naked, her skin infla

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina starts forcing her out the door. Erica pushes back. 85.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop, you're sick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get OUT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She manages to get her all the way out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But ROTHBART'S HAND grabs the door frame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina SLAMS the door, SMASHING the hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica SCREAMS in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina slams the door again, and again. The hand now human.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She finally gets the door all the way shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She steps away from it, nervous...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks down, sees one of her knees SNAP backwards, lik that of a bird. Then the other knee SNAPS back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina stumbles and falls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And SLAMS her head into the radiator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TINNY MUSIC plays in the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina flutters open her eyes. The world comes into focus a she sees her mother hovering over her, stroking her hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sshh, shhh, it's okay. I'm here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina looks around, disoriented. Sees her hands jammed ins thick socks, held on by rubber bands. Groggy, she tries t pull them off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were scratching all night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica helps remove the socks, her smashed hand wrapped in bandages.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina weakly tries to sit up, but Erica pushes her back do 86.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rest. Shhh, rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina gives in, too tired to fight her. Her eyes drift to source of the tinny music: the open jewelry box. The ballerina's been broken off, all that remains is a single amputated leg, spinning morbidly on the base.

dialogues.speaker: ERICA, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: That's good. Rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina's eyes drift to the alarm clock. It's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the clock?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina looks at the dark window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's dark. What night is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina reads Erica's face. Reality clicks in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What time is it?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina tries to sit up, but her mother pushes her back down

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry. I called the theater and told them you weren't feeling well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina freaks, struggles more violently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I want to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lie down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get off me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina squirms free of Erica's grasp and gets out of bed. S gets to the door... 87.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the doorknob's been knocked-off, leaving just a metal post sticking out of the hole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're staying in here until you feel better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina grips the metal post and pulls and pulls, shaking th door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica calmly sits down in her CHAIR, waiting for the stor pass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This role is destroying you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina rifles through her dresser drawers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She notices her mother sitting calmly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina grabs her by the wrist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're crazy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened to my sweet girl?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina yanks Erica off the chair onto the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, you're not well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Under the cushion Nina grabs the hidden brass DOORKNOB.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Erica lunges for her daughter's legs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let go! 87A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't handle it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't?! I'm the fucking swan queen! You never even got out of the corps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You fucking ungrateful-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina jams the knob onto the post, opens the door.

dialogues.speaker: ERICA, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Don't leave! Nina! 88.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina approaches the theater with harried steps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quickly past the row of SWAN LAKE posters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She reaches the side of the building, flings open the sta door and enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina frantically makes her way down the bustling hallway, chaotic with dancers. Excitement in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nears the soloists' dressing room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just outside of it, she spots a group of DANCERS excitedl chatting around a smiling Lily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina stops in her tracks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily glances in her direction, and her smile quickly fade into a sneer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other girls follow her gaze towards Nina, and their smiles turn to confusion.

dialogues.speaker: LEROY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Nina?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns and finds that Leroy has approached from behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're supposed to be sick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily, give us a minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leroy pulls Nina towards her room. Lily glares at Nina as passes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leroy closes the door behind them. He looks at Nina, whee spinning. 89.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina goes to her wardrobe, finds her two costumes hanging One for the White Swan, one for the Black Swan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She doesn't heed him, pulls out the White Swan leotard an sets it on her chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I already asked Lily-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck. Have you announced it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hasn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After Beth, do you need more controversy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leroy smirks at her directness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm here, Thomas. I'm doing it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at her, considering, and gives her a reluctant n She smiles. 90.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The only person standing in your way is you. It's time to let her go. Lose yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods. He takes one last look at her and leaves. She breathes a sigh of relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Curious, she cracks open the door and peeks outside:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leroy has pulled Lily down the corridor to break the news Lily takes off, furious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the PA, music from ACT 1 plays.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina sits at her vanity in a robe, wearing the full White Swan makeup and FEATHER CROWN. Pale, with red lipstick an dark eyeliner, she looks like a porcelain doll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She drops the robe off her shoulder and covers her rash w white makeup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The STAGE MANAGER'S voice comes through the PA speaker:

dialogues.speaker: STAGE MANAGER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Act 2's starting. Ten minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She removes a slipper off one foot. Her big and second to and her pinky and fourth toe are stuck together. Puzzled, peels them apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She removes her other slipper and finds the same toes completely FUSED, forming two large toes with double toen on either side of the middle toe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She touches the bird-like foot, concerned, but slips on h tights and hides the feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina stretches nervously in the wings, awaiting her entra

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She peeks out through a small hole in the wall, sees the AUDIENCE sitting expectantly in their seats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The music begins and they shift and mummer in anticipatio

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina pulls away, taking deep breaths and clenching her ha trying to stay calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On stage, David enters, beginning the Act. He traverses t stage, "hunting" with a crossbow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina takes a last breath and runs on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Under the spotlight, she begins dancing her intro. 92.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David runs towards her and she startles away from him, afraid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs her and they begin their first Pas de Deux.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina comes offstage, catching her breath. All around her, CORPS MEMBERS dressed as little swans rush back on stage, where FOUR LITTLE SWANS begin the Pas de Quatre.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina looks into the opposite wing and sees Leroy watching her. He gives her a small, contented nod, then disappears behind a swarm of dancers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On stage, the Four Little Swans perform. In their identic makeup and costumes, they look disturbingly alike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: During the applause, Nina catches a glimpse of David backstage, sweaty, laughing and holding someone's hands. can't see who, her view obscured by moving bodies and lim

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suspicious, Nina moves to get a better look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revealing that David's flirting with Lily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina tenses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then the Four Little Swans rush offstage past Nina. She watches them go, unsettled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing? You're on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gently nudges her, and she has to run back on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina rushes from the wings, directly into David's arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the swans are frozen in two rows on each side of the stage, looking downstage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David launches Nina into the air, hands around her waist. 93.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slowly turns her around, keeping her held high.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From her swirling, bird's eye view, Nina sees the rows of identically dressed Little Swans glaring at her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina freaks, jerking her body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David's grip SLIPS and Nina SLAMS onto the stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a horrific moment that feels like an eternity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gritting her teeth, Nina looks up around her, sees the fa of the other ballerinas. Staring at her sadistically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina finds Lily, glancing at David. He snaps to and quick helps Nina up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's too freaked to respond.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They resume dancing, Nina barely keeping it together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind them, Rothbart appears and commands his flock to e The Little Swans start swirling off stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leaving Nina and David alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David tries to pull her in one direction, but the dark ha of Rothbart summons her, transforming her back into a swa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pulls away from David, frantically flapping, until sh disappears into the wings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As soon as she's off, she breaks down, hyperventilating. dancer playing ROTHBART eyes her with concern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks up, sees his creepy MASK, and backs away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rothbart has to go back on stage to finish the Act.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Other CORPS MEMBERS surround her, chirping "You okay?, "W happened?" etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dazed, Nina doesn't answer. The music ends and there's a smattering of applause. 94.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's intermission! Act 3 in fifteen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other dancers scurry to get ready, abandoning her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina sees Leroy on stage chewing David out, behind the cl curtain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: David spots Nina, glares at her, and sulks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leroy runs his fingers through his hair, his back to Nina

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina cautiously approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It wasn't my fault. He dropped me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He can't even look at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a fucking disaster!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All alone, Nina sees everyone backstage looking at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She runs, escaping their stares.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She closes the door behind her, ready to cry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks up, and finds Lily putting on makeup and wearin the Black Swan costume.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rough start, huh? Pretty humiliating... 95.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow...rude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily coyly smiles, and continues applying makeup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm worried about the next act. Not sure you're feeling up to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop. Just stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about...I dance the Black Swan for you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina looks into the mirror. Instead of Lily's reflection there's the Double.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave me alone. Leave me alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it's my turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina's fury rises up from inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave me alone!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She charges...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And smashes her into the WALL LENGTH MIRROR, shattering i Shards fall everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Double flips Nina over and wails on her. Punch after punch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina does her best to block the onslaught.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They scuffle, knocking things over, bumping into walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Double gets her hands around Nina's neck...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gasping for air, Nina tries to pull the hands free, but s too strong. 96.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her hands frantically scramble along the surface of the floor. The fingers barely touch the edge of a MIRROR SHAR but can't grasp it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Double squeezes down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The blood vessels in Nina's eyes BURST again. Her neck st to stretch unnaturally. Strength surges through her body she lunges...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally grabbing the SHARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And DRIVES it into the Double's stomach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina glances at her hand, cut by the mirror, then back up

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Double is now LILY. Stunned, Lily looks down and touc the stab wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's my turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily coughs up blood and collapses, dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina stares at her, breathing heavily, high on adrenaline

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A KNOCK on the door.

dialogues.speaker: STAGE MANAGER, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Black Swan, places in 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina drags the stiffening body into the wardrobe closet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina zips up the back to the Black Swan costume.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She deliberately applies the Black Swan makeup. Dark eye shadow and rouge, maroon lipstick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dressed in black and wearing the dark make-up of the Blac Swan, she looks fierce.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stares at her reflection, her eyes burning RED. New rash bumps pop up on her arms, the intensity building wit 97.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina bursts onto stage as the Black Swan, accompanied by Rothbart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks powerful, intense as she moves towards David.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His face shows his surprise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina dances the first Pas de Deux with him. They finish a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She walks away from him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alone, she looks at her arms, sees black points trying to push through again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some fully emerge as shiny BLACK FEATHERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She just watches them, not panicking, but accepting the transformation taking place. Even beckoning it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her second entrance cue is played.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She leaps back on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the Coda. She takes a brief pause, closing her eyes o more, and then completely lets herself go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She spins with ferocity. More BLACK FEATHERS burst out fr her shoulders and back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At last, she truly embodies the Black Swan. 98.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She finishes the Coda, punctuating her last spin with a s step that echoes through the theater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The audience looks on, mesmerized. Too stunned to clap at first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 111D Nina looks down at the stage, her face glazed with s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She has returned to normal. No feathers. Normal eyes. A woman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She finally looks up at the audience, and they ERUPT in a standing ovation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina walks to the front of the stage, takes her bow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina looks up at the MASS OF BODIES filling the auditoriu vibrating with applause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Proud, Nina smiles and bows again. Again and again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She finally runs off stage, the applause still going stro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina enters the wings, other dancers cheer loudly. Even Veronica and Galina.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pushes past all the smiling faces. It feels very surreal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sees Leroy clapping and shaking his head. Blown away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get back out there! Get back-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stops his mouth with a kiss. The kind of kiss that yo can't stop. Not desperate, but adamant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally she disengages, staring at him in the eyes, but before he can say anything...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns and rushes back on stage. He's stunned. Like he been run over by a truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She walks towards her dressing room, a satisfied smile on face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She passes the stage manager. 99.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great job. You got fifteen til the last act.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods and arrives at her room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She opens the door, makes sure no ones looking, and enter quickly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She closes the door behind her, locks it. Turns and sees broken glass all over the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She eyes the closed wardrobe. A pool of blood drips out f under the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She picks up a towel and lays it over the blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She starts to undress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back in the White Swan costume, she re-applies the makeup

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a KNOCK on the door. She looks towards it, her fa only halfway made-up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She goes to the door, opens it just a crack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She peeks through and finds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LILY looking back at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey...you were amazing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina's petrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seriously. I'm sorry things got so messed up between us. Just, holy shit, totally blown away... 100.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina barely manages a nod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyway, wanted to tell you. I'll let you finish. Merde.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily turns and walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina swiftly shuts the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns around, stares at the wardrobe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She steps cautiously towards it, her face repeated countlessly in all the reflective shards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She lifts the towel from the ground and looks at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is clean. No blood. She looks down at the floor. No bl there either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She slowly opens the door to the wardrobe...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And finds it empty. No body whatsoever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks over at the broken mirror. Sees her reflection staring back at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stares at it for a long beat, and realizes something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She touches her stomach and winces a little. Pulls back h hand. It's coated with red liquid. Blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's started to soak through the costume, creating a fain red spot. The fabric is ripped at the center of the stain

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She feels inside for confirmation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And discovers a stab wound, in her own stomach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pulls out the sharp tip of mirror still stuck inside. Blood begins flowing more rapidly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She drops the mirror.

dialogues.speaker: STAGE MANAGER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: (On the PA) White Swan in 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a daze, she sits down at the vanity, and finishes appl the rest of the White Swan's makeup. 101.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina dances the final Pas de Deux as the White Swan. Losi blood by the second, everything is woozy and blurry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She can't do all the steps, but her performance is pained making it poignant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A spot of red begins to soak through at the center of her costume.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The music turns ominous, and VON ROTHBART, the evil sorce comes onto stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina dances away from him, back upstage, towards the clif It's time for her final leap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her energy fading, she teeters up the stairs of the set. step at a time...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gets to the top, takes one last look around, at all t eyes watching her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She notices a familiar face in the audience: HER MOTHER. watches with a profound sadness, tears streaking her chee

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the front of Nina's costume, a dark circle has started form. Her blood fully seeping through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Nina leaps...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She falls through an endless void, her eyes closed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She slowly twists around in the air, so that she's fallin backwards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hears something. Soft and muffled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The faint sound of applause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 116C She lands slowly and comfortably on PADDING. 116C

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sound of applause is now loud, uproarious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A group of BALLERINAS surround the mattress, clapping for her, each one dressed as a WHITE SWAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leroy pushes through the group to get to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen to them! They love you! Get up, get up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I always knew you had it in you, little princess. Go take your bow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina is too weak to move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lily pushes her way into the group and GASPS, pointing at Nina's abdomen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leroy follows her gaze and discovers the spot of blood, w has grown in size.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I felt it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...perfect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone, get help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leroy looks back at her. She smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was perfect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He understands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The APPLAUSE grows more and more faint. Her eyes glaze ov and everything goes completely SILENT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nina lies there motionless, a smile frozen on her face.
